00025 GrAnimPlayer::GrAnimPlayer( GrModel* target )
00026 : _cache( target )
00027 , _curAnim( 0 )
00028 , _prevAnim( 0 )
00029 , _curAnimId( ~0 )
00030 , _prevAnimId( ~0 )
00031 , _curFadeTime( 0.0f )
00032 , _fadeDuration( 0.0f )
00033 , _state( ES_STOPPED )

00049 //----------------------------------------------------------
00050 GrAnimPlayer*
00051 GrAnimPlayer::Clone( GrModel* newTarget ) const
00052 {
00054         GrAnimPlayer* newAnimPlayer = new GrAnimPlayer( newTarget );
00055         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _anims.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00056         {
00057                 newAnimPlayer->_anims.Push( _anims[ i ]->Clone() );
00058                 newAnimPlayer->_animNames.Push( _animNames[ i ] );
00059         }
00060 
00062         return newAnimPlayer;
00063 }
00064 
00065 //----------------------------------------------------------
00066 unsigned int
00067 GrAnimPlayer::AddAnim( const tstring& name, GrAnim* animRoot )
00068 {
00069         B_ASSERT( animRoot != 0 );
00070         B_ASSERT( _anims.GetElemCount() == _animNames.GetElemCount() );
00071         _anims.Push( animRoot );
00072         _animNames.Push( name );
00073         animRoot->SetPlayer( this );
00074         return ( _anims.GetElemCount() - 1 );
00075 }
00076 
00077 //----------------------------------------------------------
00078 unsigned int
00079 GrAnimPlayer::GetAnimId( const char* name )
00080 {
00081         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _animNames.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00082         {
00083                 if ( strcmp( name, _animNames[ i ].c_str() ) == 0 )
00084                         return i;
00085         }
00086         return ~0;
00087 }
00088 
00089 //----------------------------------------------------------
00090 GrAnim*
00091 GrAnimPlayer::GetAnim( unsigned int id )
00092 {
00093         B_ASSERT( id < _anims.GetElemCount() );
00094         return _anims[ id ];
00095 }
00096 
00097 //----------------------------------------------------------
00098 void
00099 GrAnimPlayer::SetActiveAnim( unsigned int id, float fadeDuration )
00100 {
00102         _prevAnim = _curAnim;
00103         _prevAnimId = _curAnimId;
00104         _curAnim = GetAnim( id );
00105         _curAnimId = id;
00106 
00108         _fadeDuration = fadeDuration;
00109         _curFadeTime = 0.0f;
00110 }
00111 
00112 //----------------------------------------------------------
00113 void
00114 GrAnimPlayer::Play()
00115 {
00116         _state = ES_PLAYING;
00117 }
00118 
00119 //----------------------------------------------------------
00120 void
00121 GrAnimPlayer::Pause()
00122 {
00123         _state = ES_PAUSED;
00124 }
00125 
00126 //----------------------------------------------------------
00127 void
00128 GrAnimPlayer::Stop()
00129 {
00130         _state = ES_STOPPED;
00131         _curAnim->SeekTo( 0.0f );
00132         if ( _prevAnim && _curFadeTime < _fadeDuration )
00133                 _prevAnim->SeekTo( 0.0f );
00134 }
00135 
00136 //----------------------------------------------------------
00137 void
00138 GrAnimPlayer::SeekCurTo( float time )
00139 {
00140         if ( _curAnim )
00141                 _curAnim->SeekTo( time );
00142 }
00143 
00144 //----------------------------------------------------------
00145 void
00146 GrAnimPlayer::ApplyPose( float timeAdvance )
00147 {
00148         if ( _curAnim )
00149         {
00150                 float blendWeight = 1.0f;
00151                 if ( _fadeDuration > 0.01 )
00152                         blendWeight = Min( _curFadeTime / _fadeDuration, 1.0f );
00153 
00155                 _curAnim->ApplyPose( timeAdvance, blendWeight );
00156 
00158                 if ( _prevAnim )
00159                         _prevAnim->ApplyPose( timeAdvance, 1.0f - blendWeight );
00160 
00162                 _cache.ApplyToTarget();
00163         }
00164 }
